ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST AP OR PA ONLY Chest radiograph Indication: dyspnea Comparison: Chest radiograph and CT chest both dated 04/23/2021 Technique: Upright AP view of the chest. Findings: Cardiac silhouette is not enlarged. Stable tortuosity of the thoracic aorta. Stable calcified granulomas in the left lung. Stable calcified granulomas in the left lung. No acute infiltrate identified. No pleural effusion, pneumothorax, or pulmonary vascular congestion. Impression: No acute cardiopulmonary process.
